Sentencas: A stable suspension has been obtained by disbursing Mn1.5Co1.5O4 (MCO) particles (100-300 nm in diameter) in ethanol using a ball milling process.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The suspension is used for deposition of a uniform MCO coating (5-8 mu m thick) on a steel (T441) substrate preheated to 200 degrees C by aerosol spraying.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the grain size of spinel crystals in the MCO coatings ranges from 100 nm to 1 Am, and remains uniform and stable when exposed to air at 800 degrees C for 1000 h. However, a Cr-rich oxide scale of approximately 0.75 mu m thick appears between the MCO coating and the T441 substrate during the exposure.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In contrast, a bare T441 sample (without the MCO coating) is oxidized significantly more under the same exposure, forming an oxide scale of 4 mu m thick.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The result indicates that the spinel coating had effectively improved the oxidation resistance of T441 by inhibiting the transport of Cr.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Besides, the results also suggest that aerosol spraying is a simple and cost-effective method for deposition of thin and dense protective coating.
Titulo: Aerosol sprayed Mn1.5Co1.5O4 protective coatings for metallic interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells
